nodes.text: Cory Allemeier was credited as an artist, alongside Molly Denmark, for the canceled video game Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic 3. They were revealed as contributers to the project alongside John Stafford in the 2008 reference book Rogue Leaders: The Story of LucasArts. He was also revealed to have drawn concept art for "Naresha," a woman of unknown importance to the story.
